function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of antibiotic-resistant bacteria due to misclassification of bacterial protective antigens (BPAs) by AI in reverse vaccinology.","Impact":"Increased resistance to existing antibiotics and difficulty in treating bacterial infections.","Mitigation":"Regular screening for antibiotic-resistant strains, validation and verification of AI predictions.","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, genetic sequencing tools.","People":"General population, healthcare providers, patients with bacterial infections.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions."},{"Description":"Misidentification or misinterpretation of clinical trial outcomes by AI, leading to incorrect drug development decisions.","Impact":"Unsafe or ineffective drugs being released to the market, potential harm to patients.","Mitigation":"Independent validation of AI predictions, rigorous testing and evaluation of AI-assisted drug development.","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence, data analysis platforms.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies.","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions."},{"Description":"Inaccurate prediction of ventilator settings by ML, impacting patient treatment and respiratory illness management.","Impact":"Suboptimal treatment, increased risk of complications for ventilated patients.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of ML algorithms, manual verification of ventilator settings by healthcare professionals.","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, medical sensors.","People":"Ventilated patients, healthcare providers, medical device manufacturers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical device manufacturers, research institutions."}]}
